					 EDIDParser Library
------------------------------------------------------------
EDIDParser is a  library  released under the LGPLv3 license,
allowing  all  .Net  developers  to  parse  and  to  extract
information from raw EDID binary data.

For more  information about this  library,  please check out
our GitHub page:
https://github.com/falahati/EDIDParser


2017 Soroush Falahati (https://falahati.net)
